name: Enterprise Integration
shortDescription: Point-to-point connections between the systems to be integrated.
description: With the  new challenges and opportunities for connecting people, systems and processes it is important to choose right integration techniq.
subtitle: Point-to-point Integration

mainTexts.text: The traditional solution to integration requirements has been point-to-point connections between the systems to be integrated.

The advantage  of such direct connections is that they can be created easily and quickly if necessary. Their decisive disadvantage : they do not scale. With point-to-point connections, the complexity of the overall system increases exponentially with each additional individual connection (spaghetti integration dilemma).
What therefore represents a quick solution in individual cases becomes a complexity trap as a strategic approach in the event of strong company growth.

paragraphs.text: With the emergence of integration servers, the hope was linked to find a silver bullet out of the spaghetti integration dilemma mentioned above: EAI - Enterprise Application Integration. In theory, an EAI hub actually reduces the integration complexity in a hub-and-spoke scenario from nxm to n connections. In practice, however, we often find ourselves preferring to take a direct flight rather than changing planes in Frankfurt (the Lufthansa hub).
list: In addition, the latency of the handling in the hub (figuratively: the transfer) can be saved and eliminated as a possible source of error.

paragraphs.text: How would it be if it were possible today to connect both worlds with each other:
list: The classic benefits of structured application integration.
With the modern possibilities of lightweight, direct linking of endpoints.

paragraphs.text: And all this on a platform that masters both types of integration and makes them available as required. A platform that is rightly called hybrid because it brings together the different scenarios on one platform with uniform handling, monitoring, error handling, etc.

benefits.text: Connectivity for the most diverse endpoints
Support for all required integration types
You always have full control and transparency
